column2: Councillors at toronto city hall retract the unconstitutional hiking of our home tax and raising of transit fairs while illegally stripping our elected mayors power
column5:
they have breached the holy bible of city hall \the constitution of canada.

\r\n

if we allow them to continue we will be in trouble
